website_summaries.verdict: These sunglasses provide a designer look at a reasonable price. Ideal for those who prefer a narrower frame.
pros: Package includes cleaning cloth and matching storage case
Many customers praise the frame's perfect fit
cons: Actual lenses may be polycarbonate, not glass
Frames can fit larger than expected on face

customer_reviews.title: Versace 2163 via Vision group/Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.text: 100% Authentic! Verified the authenticity of these Versace sunglasses. 100% brand new! The box, case ,warranty, cloth, booklet, all official! These particular sunglasses are awesome and classy.
customer_reviews.author: Winning777

customer_reviews.title: 100% Authentic
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Was at Sunglass Hut the same day I ordered them. Got home and did some research and found them on here for 118 compared to 270 at SGH. Was nervous about them being knock offs but they definitely were not. Absolutely love them. Will definitely do my research again next time
customer_reviews.author: Joker4shodo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Versace Shades
customer_reviews.text: Very nice Versace Shades. I Purchased 2 pairs of Model: VE2163 of The Vanitas Collection from Vision Group. Both pairs came “NEW” with no issues visible or otherwise. They both came promptly and included: Versace box, Sunglasses, Case, Embossed Cloth, and International Warranty Booklet with CLG Code which all Versace Sunglasses can be Authenticated Through @VERSACE.CERTILOGO.COM by entering CLG Code indicated in Booklet. I certified both pairs as Authentic VERSACE. Very pleased with this purchase, as I almost paid double elsewhere. Awesome shades!
customer_reviews.author: JSG

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Versace sunglasses, new
customer_reviews.text: They are authentic Versace sunglasses, arrived very fast and new, unused with the box, case, warranty, lens cloth,etc. Fits perfectly, great sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase👍 with a star deduction for:
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase I also authenticated via Versace.com 100% 👍 . I am very happy , I will say the frames are large maybe a bit large for my face. The reason I did not give them a 5 start rating are the specs that are on the lens - looks like a few pieces of glitter on the frames they will not come off and I assume chips in the frame coating but for me they are so small I will keep the glasses. If seen would be passed as dust.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sophisticated.
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are very sophisticated. They are a little more narrow, than the white and gold model. The black against the gold frames, is truly a very European look. These feel plastic all over, but they are genuine Versace, the numbers were verified. I think these are very classy, for the very reasonable price. They are not polarized, and I suspect the lenses are plastic. All in all, they look very expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Myers

customer_reviews.title: perfect. Exactly what i thought i was getting and ...
customer_reviews.text: Authentic, pristine, perfect. Exactly what i thought i was getting and i got it in 2 days. Came in a box, case, with certificates & materials inside no different than i’d bought it from saks 5th avenue. Last years model? No one cares. Less than half the price for these versace wraparounds? Methinks yes. Dont hesitate with this seller but just use the common sense to try them on elsewhere in person & write down the model # info.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Apparently authentic but still in doubt
customer_reviews.text: Brother bought the shades. He seem to be doubtful of the quality because the lenses seemed to have a slight ridged pattern on them. He took them to the Versace store and they said they were authentic, just as the tags claim it is. I actually don't know if he still has them. Haven't seen him wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Denny Fanelli

customer_reviews.title: Creating balance is essential to make this piece stand out
customer_reviews.text: They came from an authorized dealer, arrived exactly as described, and with certilogo [CLG] and international warranty both intact. Thank you, amazon. The sunglasses feel somewhat opulent and extravagant (well... they are Versace). I propose that you wear these sunglasses as a standalone piece. Combine them with basic, modest pieces; for example, gray t-shirts and jeans. Creating balance is essential to make this piece stand out.
customer_reviews.author: HillsW

customer_reviews.title: Info missing to fill out for the 2 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: Info missing to fill out for the 2 year warranty. Where I get the UPC code & and the Eyewear Model code ic coververd with other stickers. Can't fill out warranty. This is a premium product. I should not have to deal with things like this
customer_reviews.author: Edm

customer_reviews.title: Real product complete with verificarion code.
customer_reviews.text: This product is the real deal, they give you both the box and glasses with a serial number for anyone who is wondering if this seller is legit. The glasses itself is extremely beautiful and gives off a luxurious vibe, you will definitely get compliments for them and the view while wearing the glasses is great. The glasses have a nice weight to them as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: THUMBS UP
customer_reviews.text: WAS NOT SURE ABOUT THIS PURCHASE. FOR THE PRICE, I PULLED THE TRIGGER.... YAY!! RECEIVED THEM AND WAS VERY HAPPY. THEY ARE AUTHENTIC AND A GREAT FIT.. I WILL ALWAYS WEAR THESE WHEN THE SUN SHINES.....
customer_reviews.author: MR USA

customer_reviews.title: Richie Rich
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and authentic! I feel like Richie Rich eventhough I don't have the bank account to show it haha!
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the $$ comfy too
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i wanted. Feels nice and heavy,but balanced. Compared to my $20 walmart glasses this was worth it imo.
customer_reviews.author: DirtyrandY

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.text: EXCEPTIONAL 100% Authentic! Verified the authenticity of these Versace sunglasses. 100% brand new! The box, case, warranty, cloth, booklet, all official! These particular sunglasses are awesome and classy. The black against the gold frames, is truly a very European STYLE! the shipping & handling came promptly and included: Versace box, Sunglasses, Case, Embossed Cloth, and International Warranty Booklet with CLG Code which all Versace Sunglasses can be Authenticated Through @VERSACE.CERTILOGO.COM by entering CLG Code indicated in Booklet. I certified my Designer Shade's as Authentic Versace.
customer_reviews.author: Kray

customer_reviews.title: Coolest shades ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time that I’m gonna have purchased these same shades. They are, hands down, my favorite pair of shades that I’ve ever owned. They are durable and let almost no sunlight in, whatsoever. Not to mention that they just look cool as hell. I get tons of compliments about them, too.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Solis

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product...it’s Versace!
customer_reviews.text: Shipping is a little slow but it’s well worth the wait for the price. Was skeptical about them being so inexpensive but verified their authenticity the day of arrival! Overall extremely please with the purchase and save a considerable amount by not purchasing at the mall retail store.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew G.

customer_reviews.title: Met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are very sleek and authentic. The box comes with a verification code that you enter into the database on the Versace website, so you can ensure authenticity. I don’t doubt that certain vendors send fake or used designer sunglasses to purchasers, but that was not my experience on this occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Versace shades
customer_reviews.text: They legit because I looked up the number on the inside
customer_reviews.author: TruMont

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses arrived whit a defect in one of the lenses.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. Bought for my male friend he loves them gets a lot of compliments

customer_reviews.title: Made in the shade
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these glasses are superior. Good UV blocker and solid feel.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved them
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and he really liked them. Light weight, polarized, sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Keisha

customer_reviews.title: Versace Versace!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sunglasses definitely a must buy if your pocket is not tight !

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time for a gift
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glasses stylish and comfortable arrived on time thank you

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunglasses, perfectly packaged.
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses were a gift for my husband. They arrived in plenty of time for Christmas. The packaging was secure and arrived safely. The glasses themselves are beautiful, and come with their own branded case and an outer box also branded. There is also a microfibre cloth for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette D.

customer_reviews.title: I checked and the Versace shades were authentic and legit
customer_reviews.text: When I went online to verify the authenticity of these Versace shades came back authentic and that made them a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: An amazing set of sunglasses for the price
customer_reviews.text: An amazing set of sunglasses for the price. I am very hip to chic' styles and trends. These glasses are normally $400 or more. Legit!!!
customer_reviews.author: FullBlooded

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are NOT GENUINE AUTHENTIC VERSACE EYEWEAR NOT EVEN CLOSE PLEASE DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY ON THESE POOR QUALITY I GUESS YOU CAN CALL THEM GLASSES . YOU WILL. BE SORRY . I WISH THEY HAD THE OPTION FOR 0 STARS BECAUSE THEY REALLY ARE CRAPPY. I WANT MY MONEY BACK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Loved the fast delivery and my husband loved his sunglasses fixing to order 3 more pairs from this place. Fast, affordable and very nice

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shades. Good qaulity and looks good on my and much cheaper than I have seen at the Mall.

customer_reviews.title: Top shelf Glass lenses heavy duty You really feel like you get your moneys worth the best classes I've ...
customer_reviews.text: Top shelf Glass lenses heavy duty You really feel like you get your moneys worth the best classes I've ever owned well worth the price

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Exact color coordination, perfect fit around my face, Great price!

customer_reviews.text: Versace men's sunglasses VE2163 are Authentic, very stylish and comes with a case

customer_reviews.title: Loose frame
customer_reviews.text: Frame was too loose and they were plastic lenses. When received lens was scratched and nose pieces were extremely loose.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, in comparison to what this sunglasses normally go for.

customer_reviews.title: These are not authentic glasses by Versace!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are not good quality. Screws are not holding these together. Quality is below poor!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Lost in the sauce

customer_reviews.title: Real shades for about half the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are cool shades. I'm glad i bought them on Amazon because i saved over a hundred dollars!

customer_reviews.title: Lenses are polarized

customer_reviews.title: Everything looked good except the lenses
customer_reviews.text: Everything looked good except the lenses. They didn't have the numbers etched in them. Every pair I've had has the numbers so I'm returning them

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Easy to damage
customer_reviews.text: Real real real super clean fast delivery A1 EDIT: 1.5 years later, just an FYI to anyone, they get majorly scratched easily. Be careful with them. Easy to crush too. But they are definitely real and look great when they are clean and not scratched
customer_reviews.author: Judith S. Shumwey

customer_reviews.title: Versace is the one!
customer_reviews.text: versace is the one in my sunglass case of 25 i like the most , i have sunglasses from 10 dollars to 300 hundred dollars a pair in my case, i use the cheap. ones on the beach if i lose them no biggie, The more expensive ones are only for special occasions.

product_meta.title: Versace VE 2163 100287 Gold Metal Aviator Sunglasses Grey Lens
product_meta.description: Versace VE2163Versace have presented a beautiful squared off design that gives a different dimension to the glasses this season. The medusa emblem can be seen clearly at the temple for a signature finish that shifts seamlessly onto sturdy acetate sides for a comfortable fit. UV400 lenses. This frame comes with a two years warranty.Colour code: 100287Colour: GoldLens category: 3
feature_bullets: Model: VE2163 | Color: 100287 Sunglasses GOLD w/ GREY Lens
Made in Italy | Authorized Dealer | Buy With Confidence
